Seductive Aura.description: Your mere presence makes hearts race and minds fog.
Seductive Aura.effect: Once per encounter, you can charm one humanoid creature within 30 feet. The target must succeed on a Wit saving throw (DC = 10 + your Charisma modifier) or be charmed by you for 1d4 turns.

Feline Agility.description: You move with the grace and speed of a tiger.
Feline Agility.effect: Once per encounter, you can double your movement speed for one turn.

Adaptability.description: Humans are known for their ability to adapt to any situation.
Adaptability.effect: Once per encounter, you can reroll any skill check, attack roll, or saving throw. You must use the new roll.

Sky's the Limit.description: The aerialist performs a series of flips and twists, confusing enemies and gaining an advantage.
Sky's the Limit.effect: Gain +4 to AC and advantage on Dexterity saving throws for 1 minute.
Sky's the Limit.scaling: Increases AC bonus by +1 for every 3 additional levels.

Death-Defying Leap.description: The aerialist makes a daring leap to escape or engage enemies.
Death-Defying Leap.effect: Move up to 60 feet in a straight line, ignoring difficult terrain and avoiding opportunity attacks.
Death-Defying Leap.scaling: Distance increases by 10 feet for every 2 additional levels.

Indomitable Will.description: The fighter's sheer willpower enables them to shrug off effects that would hinder others.
Indomitable Will.effect: Gain advantage on all saving throws for 1 minute.
Indomitable Will.scaling: Duration increases by 1 round for every 2 additional levels.

Chaos Unleashed.description: The anarchist creates a chaotic distraction, causing confusion among enemies.
Chaos Unleashed.effect: All enemies within 30 feet must make a Wit saving throw or be confused for 1 minute.
Chaos Unleashed.scaling: Increase range by 5 feet for every 3 additional levels.

Guardian's Stand.description: The Shield Maiden plants her shield, creating a protective barrier around her allies.
Guardian's Stand.effect: Allies within 20 feet gain +4 to AC and resistance to all damage types for 1 minute.
Guardian's Stand.scaling: Increases AC bonus by +1 for every 3 additional levels.

Shield Bash.description: The Shield Maiden strikes with her shield, stunning enemies.
Shield Bash.effect: Deals 1d8 bludgeoning damage and the target must make a Constitution saving throw or be stunned for 1 round.
Shield Bash.scaling: Damage increases by 1d8 for every 2 additional levels.
